column1: Uchi////The price was a little high but we tasted almost everything they had to offer including a small off menu chef tasting that was amazing. For what we ate and experienced I was fine with parting with a portion of my paycheck. You really could walk out of Uchi with a sub $100 per person bill if you didnt imbibe their creative cocktails and sake
column2: or let the wait staff guide you through some amazing discoveries
column3: but what would be the fun in eating at one of Houston's premiere restaurants without letting loose a little?
